title: Agri-Tech Company Gramophone Plans To Double Headcount To 1,000 In 6 To 8 Months - Outlook India
content: Agri-Tech Company Gramophone Plans To Double Headcount To 1,000 In 6 To 8 Months  Outlook India
description: The company whose current employee strength is over 450 is planning to add over 300 professionals.
